revised_title: The Lethality and Effects of Sepedon H\#xE6;machates Venom on Various Animals
tldr: This study examines the effects of Sepedon h\#xE6;machates venom, a lethal South African snake, on various animals. The venom was extracted from dried glands and tested on frogs, rabbits, rats, cats, and pigeons. The minimum-lethal doses were determined for each animal, and the symptoms and effects of the venom were observed and documented. The results show that Sepedon h\#xE6;machates venom is highly toxic and has varying effects on different animals.
